review: Great product. Packaging or the device is very sleek and fitting. Simple to set up. Love the screen saver feature. Only issue I had with this is that it shows the "paid" versions of shows first and the option to view said show for free as a prime member is somewhat hidden
author: g.Garcia

review: I really love the Fire TV. The user interface makes it easy to browse. The voice input for search is excellent and hands down better than having to key in what you are looking for. The two things I like best are the remote control, which smartly has only seven buttons making it easy to operate by touch in low light and the superior customer service. I had one question about setup and when I used the help feature got an immediate call back from customer service. I wish all devices were engineered as smartly.
author: Raymond J Sysko
